In <u>June<\u> the Range of the Baro-
meter was (as in the last Month) be-
tween 28 & 29 inches, wut more fre-
quently under 29c50 than it was in 
that month. On Jun. 2. Rain fell with Haile 
And (as I have observed in some of these 
Papers) That <u>Cold in Sum[m]er produces 
Rain<\u>, so much Rain fell on June 5. 
After w<sup>ch<\sup> some Cloudy, with frequent 
Showers, & many days Fair to Jun. 
23, on which the Observations end. 
Thus I have given an Abstract
